room_title: Escape room "The Wizard" by Escape Plan Columbia in Columbia
review: Way more fun than expected. The wizard room was very challenging, but we made it out with four minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard" by Escape Plan Columbia in Columbia
review: The Wizard was such a fun puzzle room. We were grouped with people we didn't know but they seemed to communicate very well with us. Things we thought were clues weren't and it's really intricate to be thrown off and not have everything laid out for you. I definitely recommend this place for sure!
